Term.Name: Animated Action
Term.Definition: Indicates that the content is composed of animated action. Normally this implies cartoons or computer generated scenes or characters.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Live Action
Term.Definition: Indicates that the content is composed of live action. Normally this is camera footage of real people, animals and/or objects.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Mixed
Term.Definition: Indicates that the content is a mixture of live and animated action. Examples of this type of content include the films Who Framed Roger Rabbit and Bed Knobs and Broomsticks
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML
